Line 54: Line 54:
The band [[Cannibal Corpse]] has many songs about necrophilia and corpse defiling, such as "I Cum Blood", "Necropedophile", "Dismembered and Molested" and "Gallery of Suicide". George Fisher says that 'the songs are all in good faith, and are not meant to offend real necrophiles', despite offending everyone else.

George Fisher says that 'the songs are all in good faith, and are not meant to offend real necrophiles', despite offending everyone else.
